title: Ocean beach water front land for sale
details: This land located in Balapitiya in the South West of Sri Lanka. It's located in the highly populated tourist area. Beach front with private beach location. Luxuriest first ocean front biggest apartment building is building in 2km distance from the beach. Only biggest beach land avaiable in this tourism area. 400m from the main road. Wife Road access. Nice and fabulous beach with calm place. clear deeds.
